p: Based on the six climatic variables selected in the study, the model predicts that the projected pelican distribution currently attains an area of 596,753 km 2 ( Table 3). This area is larger than that initially projected (466,836 km 2), where the oceanographic variables were integrated. Regarding the projections of climate change for 2100, under the moderate scenario of 2.6 rcp a slight decrease (âˆ’0.68%) in pelican spatial distribution is predicted ( Table 3). Under the severe scenario of 8.5 rcp, a slight increase (4.51%) in pelican spatial distribution is predicted ( Table 3).
